meanings: (물건이) break, (산산조각 나다) smash, shatter, (금이 가다) crack

vlive.korean: 딱 깨져서... The glass was shattered... 듣기 View video GOT7 : [FULL] GOT7 SHOWCASE
촤르르륵 이렇게 다 깨져서... but the glass was broken up. 듣기 View video GOT7 : [FULL] GOT7 SHOWCASE
vlive.english: but the glass was broken up.

vlive.korean: 얼마 전에 그거 그렇게 부러지고 나니까 - 아 깨져서? After they broke not too long ago. - Oh, because they broke? 듣기 View video fromis_9 : 뉴욕은 밤이다🌌
vlive.english: After they broke not too long ago. - Oh, because they broke?

vlive.korean: 핸드폰 액정이 깨져서요. My cell phone broke. 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : [연애포차 시즌1] - EP.05 티끌은 모아 봤자 티끌
제가 폰이 다 깨져서... But my phone screen is broken. 듣기 View video BTS : BTS 빌보드상 공약😆 먹방!🍴
vlive.english: But my phone screen is broken.

examples.korean: Then they repeatedly smash the shellfish against it until it breaks open. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그리고는, 돌에 조개가 깨져서 열릴 때까지 조개류를 세게 반복적으로 부딪친다. Neungyule
examples.english: Then they repeatedly smash the shellfish against it until it breaks open. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: There was blood all over his face from a head wound. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 머리가 깨져서 그의 얼굴이 피투성이가 되었다 Neungyule
examples.english: There was blood all over his face from a head wound. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: As my appointment for today has been canceled, I've got nothing to do. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 오늘 약속이 깨져서 할 일이 없다 Neungyule
examples.english: As my appointment for today has been canceled, I've got nothing to do. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: A skater broke through the ice. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 얼음이 깨져서 스케이트타는 사람이 빠졌다. 영어영작문대사전
examples.english: A skater broke through the ice. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: This is because Starbucks recalled 250,000 children's plastic cups made in China after receiving reports of the cups breaking and posing a choking danger. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이것은 컵이 깨져서 숨을 막히게 하는 위험을 내포하고 있다는 보고를 받고 스타벅스가 중국에서 제조된 아동용 플라스틱 컵 250,000개를 회수했기 때문이에요. TIMES CORE
examples.english: This is because Starbucks recalled 250,000 children's plastic cups made in China after receiving reports of the cups breaking and posing a choking danger. Add to Wordbook
